title: The US’ true ambitions in Syria, facial recognition tech, Chicago teachers on strike
text:
What is really happening in Syria? Lee presents the US’ true purpose in the region and it isn’t altruistic. He also looks at several American protests not being given their due attention in the news, including strikes, disruptive fossil fuel protests, and actions against facial recognition technologies. Natalie McGill sits down with Lee to discuss a new trend in the opioid epidemic. Finally, Anders Lee reports on the Chicago public school teachers’ strikes.

YOUTUBE Channel Redacted Tonight
